name: 7terminals-nginx
author: Francis Pereira
description: The Nginx module allows Puppet to install, configure and maintain the Nginx server. This module is designed such that you have to populate the nginx configuration directory(/etc/nginx/conf.d) with custom file resource definitions. They must be valid nginx configuration files. By default, this directory is empty. This allows you to configure Nginx any way you want
summary: The Nginx module installs and maintains the configuration of the Nginx server.
